text: @realDonaldTrump To the nurses, doctors, epidemiologists, social workers, orderlies, researchers, and all the others who are around the world rushing in to combat the coronavirus at risk to their own health and family are"HEROES" Thank You. Trump his Republican Party and Fox News can"GO TO HELL"
